Package Domain

Class JPEG

  • java.lang.Object
    • Domain.Algorithm
      • Domain.JPEG
  • public class JPEG
extends Algorithm
    JPEG algorithm, compress from a valid ppm ASCII/BIN image in the form of an InputStream to an OutputStream and decompress a valid compressed image in the form of an InputStream to a valid binary ppm image in the form of an OutputStream.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) static double[][] c
      cosine matrix
      (package private) int[][] ChrominanceQuantizationTable
      Table related to the amount of compression and quality on color, initialized with a hand choosen table
      (package private) static double[][] cT
      transformed cosine matrix
      private int height
      image height
      private static boolean initDCTMatrices
      used to check if c and cT are initialized because matrix initialization order must be enforced (c before cT)
      (package private) int[][] LuminanceQuantizationTable
      Table related to the amount of compression and quality on light intensity, initialized with a hand choosen table
      private int m_height
      number of vertical 8x8 matrices
      private int m_width
      number of horizontal 8x8 matrices
      private int[][][][] M0
      2D matrix of 8x8 Matrices for channel 0
      private int[][][][] M1
      2D matrix of 8x8 Matrices for channel 0
      private int[][][][] M2
      2D matrix of 8x8 Matrices for channel 0
      private Huffman matrixCompressor
      instance with operations compress(InputStream,OutputStream,int) and decompress(InputStream,OutputStream,int)
      private int width
      image width

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      JPEG​(Huffman matrixCompressor)
      Default constructor initializes c and cT matrices if they arent initialized yet in any instance and sets the lossless compression algorithm

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void compress​(java.io.InputStream is, java.io.OutputStream os)
      Compress a valid ppm image from an InputStream to an OutputStream
      (package private) void DCT​(int[][] input)
      Applies the DCT-II transformation to M matrix where M = input[y][x] - 128 (centers values around 0)
      void decompress​(java.io.InputStream is, java.io.OutputStream os)
      Decompress an image compressed with compress from an InputStream to an OutputStream
      (package private) void Dequantization​(int[][] input, int[][] output, int[][] QuantizationTable)
      Dequantificates a matrix multiplying it by a QuantificationTable and storing the integer part
      (package private) static void initDCTMatrices()
      Initializes c and cT matrices with the cosine matrix and the transformed cosine matrix.
      (package private) void inverseDCT​(int[][] input)
      Applies the DCT-III transformation to input matrix and adds 128 to each to undo the 128 that was substracted in DCT-II
      (package private) int[][] inverseZigZag​(byte[] in)
      Reads from top to top doing the inverse ZigZag pattern and stores values encoded with 2 bytes to the result 8x8 matrix, after all values from "in" are stored, fills the rest with 0s
      (package private) int[][] LosslessDecode​(java.io.InputStream is)
      Decodes the given InputStream using huffman and inverse zigzag and returns the result a the 8x8 matrix
      (package private) void LosslessEncode​(int[][] mat, java.io.OutputStream os)
      Encodes the given matrix using zigzag and huffman and outputs the result to the output stream
      (package private) void Quantization​(int[][] input, int[][] output, int[][] QuantizationTable)
      Quantificates a matrix dividing it by a QuantificationTable and storing the integer part
      void setQuantizationTables​(int[][] LuminanceQT, int[][] ChrominanceQT)
      Sets the quantization tables used at compression time
      (package private) byte[] ZigZag​(int[][] in)
      Reads from bottom to top doing the ZigZag pattern and stores values from the first non 0 value to the top.

      • JPEG

        public JPEG​(Huffman matrixCompressor)
        Default constructor initializes c and cT matrices if they arent initialized yet in any instance and sets the lossless compression algorithm
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • initDCTMatrices

        static void initDCTMatrices()
        Initializes c and cT matrices with the cosine matrix and the transformed cosine matrix. Must be executed before any call to DCT and inverseDCT

      • setQuantizationTables

        public void setQuantizationTables​(int[][] LuminanceQT,
                                  int[][] ChrominanceQT)
        Sets the quantization tables used at compression time
        Parameters:
        LuminanceQT - 8x8 Luminance quantization matrix
        ChrominanceQT - 8x8 Chrominance quantization matrix

      • compress

        public void compress​(java.io.InputStream is,
                     java.io.OutputStream os)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Compress a valid ppm image from an InputStream to an OutputStream
        Specified by:
        compress in class Algorithm
        Parameters:
        is - InputStream that contains a stream of bytes with a valid ppm image codification
        os - OutputStream where the compressed image will be stored
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if reading or writting to a stream fails

      • decompress

        public void decompress​(java.io.InputStream is,
                       java.io.OutputStream os)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Decompress an image compressed with compress from an InputStream to an OutputStream
        Specified by:
        decompress in class Algorithm
        Parameters:
        is - InputStream an stream consisting in a image compressed with the compress method
        os - OutputStream where the compressed image will be stored with a valid ppm image codification
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if reading or writting to a stream fails

      • Quantization

        void Quantization​(int[][] input,
                  int[][] output,
                  int[][] QuantizationTable)
        Quantificates a matrix dividing it by a QuantificationTable and storing the integer part
        Parameters:
        input - 8x8 matrix to be quantified
        output - quantified 8x8 matrix of input
        QuantizationTable - copy of the 8x8 quantization table used by the compression

      • Dequantization

        void Dequantization​(int[][] input,
                    int[][] output,
                    int[][] QuantizationTable)
        Dequantificates a matrix multiplying it by a QuantificationTable and storing the integer part
        Parameters:
        input - 8x8 matrix to be dequantized
        output - dequantified 8x8 matrix of input
        QuantizationTable - copy of the 8x8 quantization table used by the decompression

      • DCT

        void DCT​(int[][] input)
        Applies the DCT-II transformation to M matrix where M = input[y][x] - 128 (centers values around 0)
        Parameters:
        input - 8x8 matrix to be transformed to the DCT-II transformation and stored in place

      • inverseDCT

        void inverseDCT​(int[][] input)
        Applies the DCT-III transformation to input matrix and adds 128 to each to undo the 128 that was substracted in DCT-II
        Parameters:
        input - 8x8 matrix to be transformed to the DCT-III transformation and stored in place

      • ZigZag

        byte[] ZigZag​(int[][] in)
        Reads from bottom to top doing the ZigZag pattern and stores values from the first non 0 value to the top. The values are stored in a byte[] using 2 bytes per value
        Parameters:
        in - 8x8 Matrix to be traversed
        Returns:
        array with length from 0 to 128 elements with the 2 elements per value from the in matrix traversed in zigzag from the first non 0 value.

      • inverseZigZag

        int[][] inverseZigZag​(byte[] in)
        Reads from top to top doing the inverse ZigZag pattern and stores values encoded with 2 bytes to the result 8x8 matrix, after all values from "in" are stored, fills the rest with 0s
        Parameters:
        in - array with 0 to 128 elements representing 2 elements per value
        Returns:
        8x8 Matrix obtained from in doing the inverse zigzag and filling the elements after the last value from with 0s.

      • LosslessEncode

        void LosslessEncode​(int[][] mat,
                    java.io.OutputStream os)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Encodes the given matrix using zigzag and huffman and outputs the result to the output stream
        Parameters:
        mat - 8x8 matrix that will be encoded
        os - OutputStream where the encoded 8x8 mat matrix will be encoded
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if fails to write to the OutputStream

      • LosslessDecode

        int[][] LosslessDecode​(java.io.InputStream is)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Decodes the given InputStream using huffman and inverse zigzag and returns the result a the 8x8 matrix
        Parameters:
        is - Encoded InputStream representing a 8x8 matrix encoded with zigzag and huffman
        Returns:
        8x8 Matrix decoded from the encoded InputStream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if fails to read to the InputStream
